overview: Once these strippers start shaking their fine asses in your face, you can forget all about the "no touching" rule! Victoria Givens' cabaret style performance deserves a standing ovation - especially when she offers up her tight ass to a lucky guy in the audience! Lexi Love makes a big mess when she squirts all over the stage after a breast-bouncing ride on Van Damage's rod! With four hours of sexy dancers getting down and dirty, this compilation film from Adam & Eve will satisfy your need for sleazy dancers while keeping your singles in your wallet!
title: Strippers Gone Wild
